name: @astudio/cloudflare-template
description: Cloudflare Workers deployment template for ChatUI widgets

scripts.dev: pnpm run prebuild && wrangler dev --env development
scripts.build-deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run deploy
scripts.check: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run build && wrangler deploy --dry-run

WORKER_DOMAIN_BASE.description: The domain of this worker where assets will be served. Example: https://my-astudio-widgets.example.workers.dev

WIDGET_DOMAIN.description: The widget domain for OpenAI sandbox. Example: https://example.com
